attributes.action: Ensure all children around the world are able to access primary education by 2015
attributes.additional_details:
In the year 2000, Britain, along with other governments, agreed that all children around the world should have access to primary education.  There are still 69 million children not in school and time is running out.  This petition asks that the government stick to its pledge, and to put pressure on other governments to do the same.

www.sendmyfriend.org
